1.title: Big Bottom
1.plot: How large would you have to be in order to see the atoms making up your body? A trio of friends use their superpowers to find out...with BIG results.

2.title: Antimatter Fireworks
2.plot: When the Quarx start using anti-matter to make fireworks they don't just cause a flash of light, they cause an alien invasion.

3.title: Black Holes & Marshmallows
3.plot: It seemed like a good idea at the time...Bottom and Charm decide to create a pet -- a black hole -- which ends up eating the entire world.

4.title: Another Fine Ficks
4.plot: The world is overrun with giant insects when the Quarx start messing with an obscure physical law governing how gases diffuse - Fick's laws of diffusion to be exact. And it all starts with a bottle of cola.

5.title: How to Be Invisible
5.plot: When the Quarx find out that they haven't been invited to the party of the year, they decide to make themselves invisible in order to crash it. But they change the nature of light which affects everyone at the party in an unexpected way.

6.title: Slippery Slope
6.plot: The Quarx mess with friction and accidentally cause the whole world to slip and slide into chaos.

7.title: Zombie Panic
7.plot: The Quarx speed up and slow down time in order to get tickets to see their favorite band, but end up causing a mass panic as everyone thinks they're -- zombies.

8.title: Force of Attraction
8.plot: When Bottom has a crush on a girl, Charm tries to help by making him so much heavier so that she feels a huge attraction to him - the force of gravity. But, as usual, things go a little too far and soon everyone is finding themselves pulled toward Bottom -- by gravity.

9.title: Ice-Cream Tornado
9.plot: The Quarx are too hot, so they decide to "fix" the weather and while they are at it, make ice-cream the superpower way - by creating a tornado and filling it with milk and strawberries.

10.title: Moon Magnet
10.plot: Wanting to see the Northern Lights, but not able to travel to the Arctic, the Quarx make a new super powerful magnetic pole under their town to make their own Aurora Borealis. All seems to be going well until the unintended consequences start to occur..

11.title: Eau De Bottome
11.plot: To deal with the smell of Bottom's feet, Strange changes his bacteria to smell like flowers. But when the bacteria spread to everyone else, her actions cause a global food crisis.

12.title: Poltergeist
12.plot: No one likes to tidy up, so the Quarx try a short cut. But when they decide to modify Newton's First Law of Motion, chaos ensues and everyone believes the world has been taken over by poltergeists.

13.title: Land Surfing
13.plot: The Quarx use their superpowers to create waves on land so that they can surf without getting their feet wet. Seasickness -- and an alien invasion -- ensue.

14.title: Devolution
14.plot: What could go wrong when the Quarx want to take a family photo? But they want to include all their relatives so they decide to go back to the time of dinosaurs to meet their most distant relative -- a small tree mammal -- and the course of human evolution gets derailed.

15.title: Ghost Crisis
15.plot: The Quarx mess with the properties of matter to turn themselves into ghosts. But is that such a good idea? Being a ghost has some frightening side-effects and causes the scariest Halloween ever.

16.title: Super Size
16.plot: The Quarx try and win a competition to design a new statue for the town square but somehow manage to cause an alien invasion and a great big mess. And they find out that the relationship between something's size and volume isn't as straightforward as they thought.

17.title: E=mc²
17.plot: When Strange explains Einstein's famous equation, E=mc², Bottom realizes that he can use his superpowers to turn sunlight into ...profiteroles? Will Bottom's desire for pastries wipe out the sun?

18.title: Gareth-Zilla
18.plot: When Bottom decides to use his pet lizard Gareth to make a monster movie, he sends the world into a spin - literally.

19.title: Zap
19.plot: The Quarx turn up static electricity to help them win a cheer-leading competition. Will the charge they get from static electricity help them win with a routine where the sparks literally fly?

20.title: Mask of Bottom
20.plot: There's so many amazing superpowers that can be found in nature, the Quarx think they can make their own superhero by combining the traits into one body. And that body is Bottom's.

21.title: Indestructible
21.plot: What if people couldn't get hurt? The Quarx want to make themselves -- and everyone else -- indestructible -- but they end up turning the whole world into a giant trampoline.

22.title: Beach Boys
22.plot: Bottom and Charm cause chaos when they speed up erosion in order to create a beach outside the den. As usual, they forget about unintended consequences and mayhem follows.

23.title: Melting Point
23.plot: Bottom and Charm get a great idea (they think) when they try to play a trick on Strange -- but end up causing all the buildings in the world to - melt.

24.title: Planet Squishing
24.plot: To win a photo competition the Quarx embark on a whistle-stop tour of the Solar System. But as usual with our intrepid trio, something goes more than a little wrong..

25.title: United Nations
25.plot: The Quarx decide to bring the world closer together by using their superpowers to return all the continents to the position they were in 200 million years ago when the world was all one landmass, Pangea. But who knew what consequences moving the tectonic plates of the Earth would have?

26.title: Pet Rock
26.plot: When Bottom brings back a pet rock, Strange and Charm scoff. It can't be a pet if it's not alive. And of course it can't be called living if it doesn't meet the 7 criteria for life. So Bottom decides to prove them wrong...causing a planet's worth of chaos.

imdb.plot outline: Quarx is a madcap series of scripted films for kids. Have you ever wondered what would happen if we could change the laws of physics? Watch this and find out. But we warn you - it isn't pretty. (Although it is quite funny.) From a pet black hole that goes out of control to a world overrun with giant insects, the Quarx lurch from the brink of one apocalypse to another.
imdb.title: Quarx
plot: _Quarx_ (qv) is a madcap series of scripted films for kids. Have you ever wondered what would happen if we could change the laws of physics? Watch this and find out. But we warn you - it isn't pretty. (Although it is quite funny.) From a pet black hole that goes out of control to a world overrun with giant insects, the _Quarx_ (qv) lurch from the brink of one apocalypse to another.::Jasper James
